pages.text:
April 2023 County of Marin EMS R 1
RESPIRATORY ARREST
Indications
• Absence of spontaneous ventilations; pulse present
ALS RMC
Assist breathing with BVM
If suspected opiate overdose
• Do not insert advanced airway before Narcan
• Narcan
• IV/IO/IM: 0.4-4mg
• Repeat q2-3 min until patient responds
• IN: 2-4mg (evenly split between nostrils)
• Repeat q2-3 min until patient responds
